Lovebug.description: Reduces enemy ATK by 10% when hit.

Explosive.description: On death, deal 40% of enemy Max HP.

Steel Soul.description: Reduce damage taken to 40% Max HP.

Dental Carry.description: Reduce the first damage taken to 1.

Snapper.description: Enters combat with a 10 damage Plant attack.

Fast as Fire.description: At end of turn, increase SPD by 30%.

Crybaby.description: On enter, reduce foe ATK, DEF, and SPD by 10%.

UpsideDown.description: Changes to ATK, DEF, and SPD are inverted.
